import React from 'react' import logo from '../logo.svg' import '../styles/header.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' class Header extends React.Component{ handleSignOut = () =>{ // const self = this localStorage.removeItem('status_login', false) this.props.history.push("/") } render(){ return(
